title.rendered: Tokeny Solutions – The Compliance Infrastructure for Digital Assets

content.rendered:
THE COMPLIANCE INFRASTRUCTURE FOR DIGITAL ASSETS

Realise fast onboarding, cost-efficient management and rapid transferability of private market securities

How It Works

DRIVING LIQUIDITY FOR PRIVATE MARKETS

Realise fast onboarding, cost-efficient management and rapid transferability of private market securities

How It Works
WE WORK WITH

“A dedicated STO law was voted by the National Council and we are welcoming Tokeny to the Principality to operate our STOs.”

“Tokeny Solutions is the first and foremost innovative, competent and strong team that successfully manages tokens and primary issuances.”

“We’ve found that working with a digital tokenisation provider, like Tokeny Solutions, we can actually deliver a solution that businesses need.”

“We have confidence in Tokeny Solutions’ platform and our vision and capabilities to play an important role in bringing value-added innovation to our clients and the market.”

“We are keen to propose Tokeny’s solutions and BlockID®to our clients as a more efficient method of capital formation.”

YOUR SECURITIES. UPGRADED

Issue private market securities on a hyper-efficient infrastructure

AUTOMATE COMPLIANCE

Digitally onboard investors and embed transfer rules to enforce compliance:

Codify legal obligations with smart contracts

Enforce compliance across the whole lifecycle

Streamline KYC & AML

CONTROL SECURITIES

Apply control whilst utilising blockchain technology with the T-REX protocol:

Offer digital asset custody to your investors

Complete and immutable transaction history

Manage user permissions

INCREASE TRANSFERABILITY

Improve asset liquidity for your investors:

Dynamic cap tables

T+0 automated settlement

Automatically track transfers

CROSS-CHAIN PLATFORM AND PROTOCOL

High interoperability. High Resilience. High Performance.

Digitize assets on the most scalable blockchain infrastructure available in the market.

3 seconds

to execute a token transfer

$0.01

gas fees to conduct the transfer

10k

transactions/second

Secured

by 91 validator pools and 6,000+ nodes

SEEN IN

YOUR COMPLETE WHITE-LABEL TOOLBOX

The complete solutions for issuing digital securities

Issue

Streamline the capital raising process and maximise the potential of your offering through a digital and seamless user experience.

Visit Products ⟶
Manage

Control and manage issuer interfaces, automate corporate actions and digitally manage assets across the entire lifecycle.

Visit Products ⟶
Transfer

Embed transfer rules into the securities to enforce compliance and rapidly transfer securities to eligible investors.

Visit Products ⟶
Issue

Streamline the capital raising process and maximise the potential of your offering through a digital and seamless user experience.

Manage

Control and manage issuer interfaces, automate corporate actions and digitally manage assets across the entire lifecycle.

Transfer

Embed transfer rules into the securities to enforce compliance and rapidly transfer securities to eligible investors.

Visit Products ⟶
CUSTOMERS

ACHIEVEMENTS

2017

Founding year

0

Customers

0

Jurisdictions enforced

0

Value of assets tokenized

Institutional Backing

Tokeny Solutions has raised €10 million from Euronext, Inveniam, Apex Group and K20 Fund.

Resources

Learn more about digital securities with our resources.

SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER

Every month, we share our insights on the tokenization market trends in the Tokeny Insights newsletter and update you on our product improvement in the Product Focus newsletter.

Subscribe now

excerpt.rendered: Product Focus ComplyDeFi: The Compliance SDK For DeFi Protocols We are pleased to announce the release of the ComplyDeFi SDK, an easy-to-integrate tool that enables Web3 developers to launch permissioned DeFi protocols. This content is taken from the monthly Product Focus newsletter in February 2022. Who is ComplyDeFi for?  DeFi protocols, Web3 applications and Decentralized...
